xwikidoc.content: admin.office365=Office365 office365.config.heading=Office365 Integration Configuration office365.config.explanation=XWiki can be integrated with Office365, which allows you to view Office Attachments in XWiki documents view Office365 OneDrive search results in the XWiki search. See [[Office365.WebHome]]Â for the configuration instructions. See [[Office365.SitesList]] to view the list of sharepoint sites usable in the configuration. Office365.Office365ConfigClass_tenant=Tenant Name Office365.Office365ConfigClass_clientid=Client ID Office365.Office365ConfigClass_secret=Secret Key Office365.Office365ConfigClass_activateSearchExtension=Activate Search UI Extension office365.uiextension.nomatchingdocs=No Office365 documents matching query {0} office365.uiextension.matchingdocs={0} Office365 documents matching query {1} office365.uiextension.error=Error searching for Office365 documents for query {0} office365.documentlist.title=Office365 - document list office365.documentlist.description=This sample shows a search result on Office365 drive: office365.documentlist.searchterm=Search Term office365.documentlist.search=Search office365.cannotauthenticate=Could not authenticate on Office 365 - [[Clear authentication>>||queryString="clearAuth=1"]] office365.macro.cannotdisplaypdf=This macro cannot display a pdf document office365.macro.search.description=To insert or change the current Office365 document being embedded, you need to search for it and choose which document to embed. Use the following form to find your document. office365.macro.search.insert=Insert an Office365 Document: office365.macro.search.search=Search office365.macro.search.embed=embed this document office365.macro.search.error=Error searching Office 365: office365.macro.requireauth=This macro might require authentication on Office365 office365.macro.change=Change office365.macro.view=View office365.macro.personaldrive=Personal Drive office365.macro.sharepointsite=Sharepoint Site
